about_the_game:
CHOOSE YOUR SIDE

Pick your faction and dive into the struggle. Whether fighting for the ideals of collective progress or championing individual freedom, every battle is a test of resilience, strategy and sometimes just plain luck. The choices you make—what you equip and how you fight can determine if you live to see another day.

SURVIVE

Survive the onslaught and reach extraction. Trapped in a hostile battlefield, you must withstand waves of enemy factions while managing your limited resources. Min-max your equipment, wield powerful Nanite-based abilities, and adapt to escalating threats as you fight against time and overwhelming odds.

A FRACTURED FUTURE

In a dystopian world ruled by the wealthy elite, society is torn between left-wing loyalists in sprawling mega cities and right-wing patriots resisting in the untamed wilds. As chaos spreads, powerful entities like BioNex and the Neo Elite Forum deploy ruthless Davos MaxTac mercenaries to enforce their agenda, leaving humanity locked in a desperate fight for survival.

name: TDS

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600, 3.3 GHz or AMD Ryzen 5 1500X, 3.5 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti (Maxwell or newer), 2 GB or AMD Radeon R7 360, 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Minimum System Requirements may change.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-11600K, 3.9 GHz or AMD Ryzen 5 5600X, 3.7 GHz or Greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070, 8 GB or AMD Radeon RX 590, 8 GB or Greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Recommended System Requirements may change.

steam_germany.descriptors:
Alkohol / Tabak
Derbe Sprache
Ängstigende Inhalte

short_description: A dystopian survival action game where you battle enemy factions, manage resources, and endure relentless waves of foes. Master Nanite-powered abilities, hone your equipment, and fight to survive in a fractured world on the brink of collapse.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Finnish, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support
